name: Beef Lasagna
description: Layers of rich beef ragù, creamy béchamel, and perfectly cooked pasta. A Divine classic.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Tender chicken breast with fettuccine in our signature creamy Alfredo sauce.

name: Mediterranean Salad
description: Fresh greens, feta cheese, olives, cucumbers, and tomatoes with olive oil dressing.

name: Greek Salad Bowl
description: Authentic Greek salad with crisp vegetables, feta, and kalamata olives.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce. Served with basmati rice.

name: Slow-Cooked Lamb Curry
description: Aromatic slow-cooked lamb with traditional spices and fresh herbs.

name: Quinoa Power Bowl
description: Nutrient-rich quinoa with roasted vegetables, chickpeas, and tahini dressing.

name: Wild Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Arborio rice with wild mushrooms, parmesan, and truffle oil.

name: Teriyaki Salmon
description: Grilled salmon glazed with house-made teriyaki sauce, served with jasmine rice.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan, croutons, and our creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Asian Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: Colorful seasonal vegetables wok-tossed with ginger, garlic, and soy sauce.

name: Classic Tiramisu
description: Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa.
